project.name: |---- 016-html-tables
project.description:
This project discusses html tables to display data in a tabular fashion.
The elements that conforms the table element are introduced with a very simple table that will be reused in the following project: + table : the element for the whole table + caption : the text that must go with the table explaining its contents + tr : the table row element + th : a table header cell + td : a table data cell
No special CSS is used to style the table, only the minimum border to make the cells visible.
